name: A Pixel Ago: Rose Blossom [DEMO]
description:
'A Pixel Ago: Rose Blossom' is the sequel of "A Pixel Ago", a musical platform-like game, where you play as Pix and the only goal you have is to escape from the musical notes in order for them to play.

. . .  INFO  . . .

This game is a prototype, and it's nowhere near finished and it will constantly be updated to improve and increase playability.

. . . STORY . . .

Pix grew into a bigger pixel within the spring season, and roses are blossom, as one can see by the falling petals of the roses.
This is his favourite season of the year. And the only thing upsetting him if the music playing and all the notes floating in he air.
Help him avoid all the musical notes, so he can be happy.

. . . GAMEPLAY . . .

With the new and revamped UI, you'll see that it got easier to play this game.
Just like the old game, all you have to do is move the pixel up and down, using the buttons on the screen.

Keep increasing your score, and find, amongst your friends, who is the best.

. . . FEATURES . . .

Move...

...the player up and down to avoid the musical notes. 'Cause that's all you need to do in this game.

And beat...

...your own score.

. . . AVAILABILITY . . .

For now, the game will only be available on itch.io, but will soon be launched on  on Google Play.

. . .  DEVLOG . . .

version 1.0.2.1 _ Autopla bug fixed.
version 1.0.2.0 _ Autoplay Mode Added.
version 1.0.1.0 _ Save File and Highscore Added.
version 1.0.0.0 _  Game is playable without issues.
